text:
<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Degraded Call Handling>
We are investigating degraded call handling by agents using the Amazon Connect softphone in the US-EAST-1 Region.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Degraded Call Handling>
We are investigating degraded call handling by agents using the Amazon Connect softphone in the US-EAST-1 Region.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Service is operating normally: [RESOLVED] Degraded Call Handling>
Between 8:17 AM and 9:30 AM PDT we experienced degraded call handling by agents using the softphone in the US-EAST-1 Region. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.
